sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { auth = new FormGroup({ login: new FormControl('',Validators.required), password: new FormControl('',Validators.required) }); onSubmit() { console.warn(this.auth.value); } }
